query builder getTable.description: Gets the name of the primary table.

query builder getBinds.description: Returns an array of bind values and their named parameters for binding in the Query object later.

query builder ignore.description: Set ignore Flag for next insert, update or delete query.

query builder select.description: Generates the SELECT portion of the query.

query builder selectMax.description: Generates a SELECT MAX(field) portion of a query.

query builder selectMin.description: Generates a SELECT MIN(field) portion of a query.

query builder selectAvg.description: Generates a SELECT AVG(field) portion of a query.

query builder selectSum.description: Generates a SELECT SUM(field) portion of a query.

query builder selectCount.description: Generates a SELECT COUNT(field) portion of a query.

query builder selectSubquery.description: Adds a subquery to the selection.

query builder distinct.description: Sets a flag which tells the query string compiler to add DISTINCT.

query builder from.description: Generates the FROM portion of the query.

query builder join.description: Generates the JOIN portion of the query

query builder where.description: Generates the WHERE portion of the query. Separates multiple calls with 'AND'.

query builder orWhere.description: Generates the WHERE portion of the query. Separates multiple calls with 'OR'.

query builder whereIn.description: Generates a WHERE field IN('item', 'item') SQL query, joined with 'AND' if appropriate.

query builder orWhereIn.description: Generates a WHERE field IN('item', 'item') SQL query, joined with 'AND' if appropriate.

query builder whereNotIn.description: Generates a WHERE field NOT IN('item', 'item') SQL query, joined with 'AND' if appropriate.

query builder orWhereNotIn.description: Generates a WHERE field NOT IN('item', 'item') SQL query, joined with 'OR' if appropriate.

query builder havingIn.description: Generates a HAVING field IN('item', 'item') SQL query, joined with 'AND' if appropriate.

query builder orHavingIn.description: Generates a HAVING field IN('item', 'item') SQL query, joined with 'OR' if appropriate.

query builder havingNotIn.description: Generates a HAVING field NOT IN('item', 'item') SQL query, joined with 'AND' if appropriate.

query builder orHavingNotIn.description: Generates a HAVING field NOT IN('item', 'item') SQL query, joined with 'OR' if appropriate.

query builder like.description: Generates a %LIKE% portion of the query. Separates multiple calls with 'AND'.

query builder notLike.description: Generates a NOT LIKE portion of the query. Separates multiple calls with 'AND'.

query builder orLike.description: Generates a %LIKE% portion of the query. Separates multiple calls with 'OR'.

query builder orNotLike.description: Generates a NOT LIKE portion of the query. Separates multiple calls with 'OR'.

query builder havingLike.description: Generates a %LIKE% portion of the query. Separates multiple calls with 'AND'.

query builder notHavingLike.description: Generates a NOT LIKE portion of the query. Separates multiple calls with 'AND'.

query builder orHavingLike.description: Generates a %LIKE% portion of the query. Separates multiple calls with 'OR'.

query builder orNotHavingLike.description: Generates a NOT LIKE portion of the query. Separates multiple calls with 'AND'.

query builder orGroupStart.description: Starts a query group, but ORs the group.

query builder notGroupStart.description: Starts a query group, but NOTs the group.

query builder orNotGroupStart.description: Starts a query group, but OR NOTs the group

query builder havingGroupStart.description: Starts a query group for HAVING clause.

query builder orHavingGroupStart.description: Starts a query group for HAVING clause, but ORs the group.

query builder notHavingGroupStart.description: Starts a query group for HAVING clause, but NOTs the group.

query builder orNotHavingGroupStart.description: Starts a query group for HAVING clause, but OR NOTs the group.

query builder havingGroupEnd.description: Ends a query group for HAVING clause.

query builder set.description: Allows key/value pairs to be set for insert(), update() or replace().

query builder getSetData.description: Returns the previously set() data, alternatively resetting it if needed.

query builder getCompiledSelect.description: Compiles a SELECT query string and returns the sql.

query builder get.description: Compiles the select statement based on the other functions called and runs the query.

query builder countAll.description: Generates a platform-specific query string that counts all records in the particular table.

query builder countAllResults.description: Generates a platform-specific query string that counts all records returned by an Query Builder query.

query builder getCompiledQBWhere.description: Compiles the set conditions and returns the sql statement.

query builder getWhere.description: Allows the where clause, limit and offset to be added directly

query builder setData.description: Allows a row or multiple rows to be set for batch inserts/upserts/updates.

query builder getCompiledUpsert.description: Compiles an upsert query and returns the sql.

query builder upsertBatch.description: Compiles batch upsert strings and runs the queries.

query builder updateFields.description: Sets update fields for upsert, update.

query builder onConstraint.description: Sets constraints for batch upsert, update.

query builder setQueryAsData.description: Sets data source as a query for insertBatch()/updateBatch()/upsertBatch()/deleteBatch()

query builder insertBatch.description: Compiles batch insert strings and runs the queries.

query builder setInsertBatch.description: Allows key/value pairs to be set for batch inserts.

query builder getCompiledInsert.description: Compiles an insert query and returns the sql.

query builder insert.description: Compiles an insert string and runs the query

query builder replace.description: Compiles a replace into string and runs the query.

query builder getCompiledUpdate.description: Compiles an update query and returns the sql.

query builder update.description: Compiles an update string and runs the query.

query builder updateBatch.description: Sets data and calls batchExecute to run queries.

query builder setUpdateBatch.description: Allows key/value pairs to be set for batch updating.

query builder emptyTable.description: Compiles a delete string and runs "DELETE FROM table".

query builder truncate.description: ompiles a truncate string and runs the query If the database does not support the truncate() command This function maps to "DELETE FROM table".

query builder getCompiledDelete.description: Compiles a delete query string and returns the sql.

query builder delete.description: Compiles a delete string and runs the query.

query builder deleteBatch.description: Sets data and calls batchExecute to run queries.

query builder increment.description: Increments a numeric column by the specified value.

query builder decrement.description: Decrements a numeric column by the specified value.

query builder resetQuery.description: Publicly-visible method to reset the QB values.
